import React, { Component } from 'react' import Bottom from './Bottom'; import Header from './Header'; import {useState} from 'react' export default class Buidan extends Component { state = { loadin: true, list: [], search:'' } async componentDidMount(){ const url= "http://127.0.0.1:5000/buidan"; const response = await fetch(url); const data =await response.json(); this.setState({list: data.data, loadin: false}); console.log(data.data) } render() { if (this.state.loadin){ return
loading
